meanings.definition: The craft of covering a structural carcass with pieces of veneer forming decorative patterns, designs, or pictures.
meanings.sent1: She admired the intricate marquetery on the wooden jewelry box.
meanings.sent2: The antique table featured beautiful marquetery designs on its surface.
meanings.sent3: The marquetery on the cabinet made it look like a piece of art!
meanings.sent4: Her talent for marquetery turned simple furniture into masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The marquetery work on the clock was so detailed, it seemed almost magical.
